author: HyperSec
description: HyperSec Endgame prevented Permission Theft. Click the HyperSec Endgame icon in the event.module column or the link in the rule.reference column for additional information.
name: Permission Theft - Prevented - HyperSec Endgame
query: event.kind:alert and event.module:endgame and endgame.metadata.type:prevention and (event.action:token_protection_event or endgame.event_subtype_full:token_protection_event)
